title: SOME WAREZ for USBdisk or Harddrive

forumNotes.author: was_The Magizian
forumNotes.content:
Fastest, most powerful OS on earth, can even boot and run from a little USBdisk.... **LINKS REMOVED** by jaclaz
As far as legalities go, it is completely legal for anyone who has ever purchased a copy of MS XP pro to Download, install, operate, and even register/activate windoze magizia hyperturbo os..... as long as they have installed their xp on less than 14 computers per copy. Also, if you compare the files of **SOME WAREZ** to XP pro you will find more than 25% of the code is different, which made it patentable. Enjoy! Hunter Reon Barnes "The Magizian"

forumNotes.author: was_The Magizian
forumNotes.content:
Peter, if you seriously feel you cannot wait 30 seconds or 45 seconds before downloading the file, there are ways around that too. Personally, I think you can handle waiting 30 seconds before downloading. HRB  

Alternatively, there are about 50 other mirrors for the current build. Each mirror including the two posted here are free to download the file from.... some of them want you to wait 30-45 seconds before download.

forumNotes.author: pscEx
forumNotes.content:
I only posted my personal opinion when trying to download the link(s) you posted.  

For me, if I click a download link I got inside boot-land.net, I suppose to start the download immediatelly.  

And that is what other users propably also aspect.  

As known, there are currently a lot of WEB sites offerring a download to the user, and if you download, you some days later get a bill (because you did not se the hidden AGB).  

Therefore I personally do not accept ANY download link inside WB which points outside WB.  

You can host your product inside boot-land.net (If the contents is accepted and you seem to be serious) and ask for your own domain.  

Peter

Fact is, **SOME WAREZ** for USBdisk or HardDrive is the fastest, most powerful, most secure OS on or off the market.. It has already been compared side by side with the others, including all of yours.  

But whatever... at most you'll simply cut yourselves off from future technology releases from me.  

Maybe you'll change your mind before the release of OS 9.

forumNotes.author: Galapo
forumNotes.content:
> I don't consider Winbuilder functional yet, bartPE seems to be what ya'll are working towards.. and winbuilder has a large insecurity factor.

Actually, we're not working towards BartPE at all, really getting further and further away from it. It's over two years now since I fired up BartPE, I would really dread having to go back to plugins etc. Also, I remember autobuild post-processing to get a build into shape -- better with WinBuilder and only adding what is desirable.  

Regards,  
Galapo.

forumNotes.author: pscEx
forumNotes.content:
> Lance, your mistaken, I have examined Winbuilders builds, and your also mistaken if you think bartpe contains no MS... It's MS windows setup with some changes... which is obvious.

When scripts contain M$ files, that is a fault of the script author. And whenever this is seen in the forum, the author is asked to become legal and remove them.  

At least in nativeEx **no** M$ file is distributed. **Everything** is copied or extracted from the source CD or local installation the user has.  

Peter

forumNotes.content:
> Think y'all are jumping the gun a bit... And before you say any of it is MS and undistributable, do file comparisons. But then hey, when it first came out, half of you were calling it a virus without ever having seen it. > > I don't consider Winbuilder functional yet, bartPE seems to be what ya'll are working towards.. and winbuilder has a large insecurity factor. > > Fact is, WinDoze Magizia HyperTurbo OS 8.1 for USBdisk or HardDrive is the fastest, most powerful, most secure OS on or off the market.. It has already been compared side by side with the others, including all of yours. > > But whatever... at most you'll simply cut yourselves off from future technology releases from me. > > Maybe you'll change your mind before the release of OS 9. Let's try NOT to make a "conversation between deaf people", please. You came here out of the blue and with NO background, NO info, NO nothing, posted a couple of links to something saying go and test it, it is legal mumble....jumble...fast...better....secure....market.... We ARE NOT going to try something that has all the typical appearances of a WAREZ release: * it has no homepage * it has no docs * it has no license * it is hosted on free-hosting sites * it is linked from half the WAREZ sites around * it has the word Turbo in it's name :wink:
It is posted with these sentences: > As far as legalities go, it is completely legal for anyone who has ever purchased a copy of MS XP pro to Download, install, operate, and even register/activate windoze magizia hyperturbo os..... as long as they have installed their xp on less than 14 computers per copy. Also, if you compare the files of WinDoze Magizia to XP pro you will find more than 25% of the code is different, which made it patentable. that make NO SENSE in plain English, besides making NO SENSE with the common experience we have with the legalities involved with Microsoft files and with patents. I won't comment on the politeness of your intervention, basically saying: > I am great, you (the actual owners of the house you just entered) are a bunch of incompetents that didn't even manage to create a working copy of Bart PEbuilder. but be aware that you are walking on a fine line there too. :wink: Compare with this: [http://www.boot-land...?...=4064\&st=21](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=4064&st=21 "External link") Now, if you would kindly try to explain what you meant, what is the project and give some background to the above sentences, etc., etc., we can go on, otherwise I will simply delete this thread, ban you and your current IP from the board. And yes, it is likely that I will be cut off from "future technology releases" from you, though strangely enough, I am not feeling a sense of loss I won't be able, in due time, to overcome. :wink: You have 24 h starting from now to PM me the above info and whatever you may want to add to them. ....tick ...tick ...tick ![:confused1:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/confused1.gif) jaclaz This thread is CLOSED for the moment.
